channel.title: KillBait RSS Feed

item.title: France launches a voluntary national service program aiming to strengthen ties between youth and armed forces

item.title: Israeli attacks in Gaza during ceasefire leave 356 Palestinians dead and over 900 injured, Gaza Health Ministry reports
item.description: The Gaza Health Ministry has reported that 356 Palestinians have been killed and 908 injured since the Gaza ceasefire took effect on October 11, 2025. Despite the truce, Israeli attacks have continued...

item.title: How billionaires stole America's elections
item.description: The video explores how the wealth of billionaires impacts American elections, examining their role in funding political campaigns and shaping policies to benefit their interests.
